answers.answer: Hi,You may also be interested in checking out the Diabetes community and Heart Rhythm community. There may also be some recipes in there.Diabetes - Type 2:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Diabetes---Adult-Type-II/show/46Heart Rhythm:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Heart-Rhythm/show/92Good luck!

question: I am 60 and have already diabetes 2 angioplasty and recently experienced two arrhythmia events which were very stressful. I think the forum would be the best source of info on my condition. Please share healthy food recipies you know work.Sincerely, first time forum user natalia
title: fight diabetis2 and heart problems with healthy cooking
